website_summaries.verdict: The Adidas Superstar Foundation as another variation of the classic and one of the Adidas brand’s iconic silhouettes, the Adidas Superstar. This version of the Superstar pays tribute to the classic, simple look of the silhouette and features the signature rubber shell toe and a full-grain leather upper. The shoe offers great comfort for the wearer and with its versatility in style and a price that doesn’t leave a huge gash on the wallet, one can never go wrong with this low-top sneaker.
pros: A majority of the reviewers claim that the Adidas Superstar Foundation is a quite comfortable shoe
A good number of buyers were highly appreciative of the stylish design of the sneaker
Some of the users enjoy the compliments they get every time they wear the shoe
A handful of users love how the sneaker can go well with different types of outfit choices
Several of the buyers say that they would definitely buy the shoe again
One reviewer says that the shoe is better than expected
Most of the reviewers state that they would definitely recommend this to their peers
A variety of color combinations for the shoe is offered by Adidas
The shoe can be purchased at an affordable price
cons: Some of the reviewers complain about the shoe being too narrow for their feet
A few users gripe that this sneaker is stiff

customer_reviews.title: Fab !!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! So comfortable and fit exactly as they should. I bought a different pair from a different seller in white and they are no where near as comfy as these. Bought in January and will buy more for 'best' love them.
customer_reviews.author: Anamrie

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic as always
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic quality, excellent condition, fast delivery. Thank you. Fits perfect. I'm size women's 6 and they fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jemma Jennings

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: I have had this brand before and they fitted lovely. This pair is the same size as before but too small
customer_reviews.author: Lesley Box

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves them
customer_reviews.text: No problems straight out of box they were good. My daughter has no had blisters and they are very confortable
customer_reviews.author: bearlake

customer_reviews.title: Not same as picture
customer_reviews.text: Had to return as picture showed gold Adidas writing on but hadn't got it on shoe
customer_reviews.author: Susan adams

customer_reviews.title: Very happy - bargain price 👍
customer_reviews.text: My son asked for some superstars for his bday and these were the cheapest ones I could find. Prompt delivery, they were packaged great. My son loves them. Usual Adidas quality.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbydunn123

customer_reviews.title: smelled that awesome new shoes' smell when I opened the box
customer_reviews.text: Sneakers came on time, smelled that awesome new shoes' smell when I opened the box :) they fit perfectly, even without walking with them or tying the laces, just put them on my feet directly out of the box :) Would order again!
customer_reviews.author: Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Trainers
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy trainers, worn all day everyday with no problems
customer_reviews.author: marshal j b day

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: That's what I was looking for. Perfect black shoes for a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Karolina Kossuth

customer_reviews.title: Iconic trainers, delivered on time and for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Iconic trainers, look great, fit great, very comfy, delivered on time and for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Wilkins

customer_reviews.title: Decent trainers.
customer_reviews.text: Bought to replace an old pair. Subtle and stylish casual trainers. Well pleased.
customer_reviews.author: niccolsson

customer_reviews.title: Present
customer_reviews.text: I bought these s a present for my daughter and she love's them.
customer_reviews.author: V Jamo

customer_reviews.title: Really Good Trainers
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product and very resistant to atmospheric conditions. Fast delivery as well, highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: they fit great, comfy and look the part
customer_reviews.text: My son says these trainers are " sick ", they fit great, comfy and look the part, in the words of a 15 year old !!
customer_reviews.author: magic35

customer_reviews.title: ... but with insoles and gel pads added fit much better. Still well worth the cost 😊
customer_reviews.text: A bit bigger than expected but with insoles and gel pads added fit much better. Still well worth the cost 😊
customer_reviews.author: ann

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shoes, i always have at least one pair of Superstars!
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Meylof

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, comfortable from day one and very reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A great buy and they turned up a day early..happy days.
customer_reviews.author: Murray

customer_reviews.title: Great Summer Sneakers!
customer_reviews.text: Great, smart trainers, perfect for holiday! These items were delivered 2 days after despatch, packaged nicely in box. Trainers are exactly as described and expected and a bargain price (£5 cheaper than in most high street stores/websites)!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: she is very happy with them
customer_reviews.text: I bought as a present for my daughter, she is very happy with them, fits great and a comfy trainer
customer_reviews.author: alex

product_meta.title: adidas Unisex Adults’ Superstar Foundation Trainers
product_meta.description: Starting with its 1969 release, the adidas Superstar became a cult hit in the gym and on the streets. These shoes celebrate the clean simplicity of the original, with a leather upper on a low-profile cupsole, trimmed with classic details.
